title: LOL After I click Launch does not open
body:
I press the launch button but the client does not open, the launcher does not disappear either. I have tried reinstalling the game, using the repair option, deleting the things from the RADS/Project. But it all does not work. After i click the launch button and wait around 3 minutes, it shows this accept/decline the rules thing. I press accept. After around another 10 minutes, it shows it again and i press accept. Then I think the game will work, but after waiting 30 minutes it does not work. Help please.
UPDATE: I use windows 10 and Bitdefender Total Security 2016.

replies.body: do you have avast?  if yes, read other threads on same issue.  avast seems to suddenly think its a virus
No I use bitdefender and I have tried disabling its firewall.

> [{quoted}](name=Cieux,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=KBxnGR5Y,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-13T00:48:20.455+0000)
>
> first, try this: 
> ____
> Game Won't Start After I Hit the .exe / Play button
> 
> 1. Try running as an admin by right clicking on the executable and selecting "Run As" and "Administrator", or by using the lol.admin.launcher.exe
> 
> 2a. Delete everything inside the your RADS downloads folder (Default Path is, C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\downloads) AND
> 2b. Delete everything inside your RADS solutions folder ( Default Path is, C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions)
> 2c. Restart your computer and repatch
> _____
Doesn't work. Soz for late reply.
